column2: but still pretty good.  The sausage is under-seasoned for my taste
column3: and my wife didn't like the tomato sauce.  The butter crust is nice
column4: but this pizza is so intensely filling
column5: you don't get to much of the butter crust in the first sitting
column6: and it gets soggy when it sits around.  Lou Malnati's did not live up to its reputation.
